titleStmt.title: A true relation of the ceremonies at the creating of the Knights of the Honourable Order of the Bath, the 18. & 19., April, 1661 with a perfect list of their names in the same order as they were knighted by His Majesty.
titleStmt.author: Stephens, Philemon.

notesStmt.note: Caption title: The ceremonies at installing the Knights of the Honourable Order of the Bath, 19 April 1661.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
